alert.note: Alert for Bent; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 4:10PM MDT until June 23 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL PROWERS AND EAST CENTRAL BENT COUNTIES... At 410 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Hasty, or 16 miles west of Lamar, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lamar, John Martin Reservoir and Caddoa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
